languages.text: Похоронив братьев, Ульфар почуял бремя усталости и потерь на плечах своих. Преданность его Всеотцу была крепка, но сердце исстрадалось в десятилетиях битв. Не в силах изменить клятвам, данным однажды, он продолжил петь сагу стаи в одиночку, последний из Зловещего воя. Сотни легенд на разных мирах сложены об Одиноком волке. Покрыв броню серым плащом, он появлялся и исчезал, оставляя после себя лишь трупы нечестивцев. Народ слагал истории о таинственном мстителе, сотни юных героев, Волчата, уходили за ним. Никого из них Ульфар не звал с собой, ничьего имени не запоминал и ни о ком не горевал — он искал лишь достойной смерти, но все не мог найти. Он всегда выживал.

After burying his brothers, Ulfar felt the weight of exhaustion and loss on his shoulders. His loyalty to the Allfather was strong, but his heart had suffered much over his decades of battles. Unable to break his vows, he continued to sing the saga of his pack alone, the last of the Baleful Howl. Hundreds of legends on myriad worlds are told of the Lone Wolf. Covering his armour with a grey cloak, he would appear and vanish again, leaving only the corpses of the unrighteous behind. Stories were crafted about the mysterious avenger, and hundreds of young heroes, Wolflings, began to follow him. Ulfar did not call on them. He did not remember their names and did not mourn them. He longed only for an honourable death, but could not find it. He always survived.
languages.original_text: Похоронив братьев, Ульфар почуял бремя усталости и потерь на плечах своих. Преданность его Всеотцу была крепка, но сердце исстрадалось в десятилетиях битв. Не в силах изменить клятвам, данным однажды, он продолжил петь сагу стаи в одиночку, последний из Зловещего воя. Сотни легенд на разных мирах сложены об Одиноком волке. Покрыв броню серым плащом, он появлялся и исчезал, оставляя после себя лишь трупы нечестивцев. Народ слагал истории о таинственном мстителе, сотни юных героев, Волчата, уходили за ним. Никого из них Ульфар не звал с собой, ничьего имени не запоминал и ни о ком не горевал — он искал лишь достойной смерти, но все не мог найти. Он всегда выживал.

traits.locale_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar felt the weight of exhaustion and loss on his shoulders. His loyalty to the Allfather was strong, but his heart suffered too much in the decades of battles. Not able to break his vows once given, he continued to sing the saga of his pack alone, the last Famehungry. Hundreds of legends are sung on different worlds about the Lone Wolf. Covering his armour with a grey cloak, he appeared and vanished, leaving only the corpses of the unrighteous behind. People created stories about the mysterious avenger, and hundreds of young heroes, Wolflings, went after him. Ulfar called for none of them, he did not remember their names and did not mourn for them. He longed only for an honourable death and could not find it. He always survived.

Unable to break his vows, he continued to sing the saga of his pack alone, the last of the Baleful Howl. Hundreds of legends on myriad worlds are told of the Lone Wolf. languages.text: 乌尔法埋葬了他的兄弟们之后，疲惫与失落的重担深深地压在了的肩上。尽管他对全父的忠诚依然坚韧，但数十年的战斗中已使他的心灵满是创伤。他无法违背他的誓言，于是便继续孤身一人闯荡，身为“怒嚎者”狼群最后的野狼，孤独地传唱着狼群的史诗。这头孤狼的诸多传说在无数世界流传。他以灰色的斗篷盖住他的盔甲，突然出现，而后又突然消失，在身后留下不义之人的尸体。无数关于这位神秘复仇者的故事被精心撰写出来，数百名自称“幼狼”的年轻英雄自发追随他的脚步，但乌尔法并没有回应他们。他既没有记住那些人的名字，也没有为他们的死亡而哀悼。他唯一渴望的只有光荣的死亡，但他的渴望迟迟未能实现。他活了下来，一如既往。
languages.original_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar felt the weight of exhaustion and loss on his shoulders. His loyalty to the Allfather was strong, but his heart had suffered much over his decades of battles. Unable to break his vows, he continued to sing the saga of his pack alone, the last of the Baleful Howl. Hundreds of legends on myriad worlds are told of the Lone Wolf. Covering his armour with a grey cloak, he would appear and vanish again, leaving only the corpses of the unrighteous behind. Stories were crafted about the mysterious avenger, and hundreds of young heroes, Wolflings, began to follow him. Ulfar did not call on them. He did not remember their names and did not mourn them. He longed only for an honourable death, but could not find it. He always survived.

traits.locale_text: 乌尔法埋葬了他的兄弟们之后，疲惫与失落的重担深深地压在了的肩上。尽管他对全父的忠诚依然坚韧，但数十年的战斗中已使他的心灵满是创伤。他无法违背他的誓言，于是便继续孤身一人闯荡，身为“渴名者”狼群最后的野狼，孤独地传唱着狼群的史诗。这头孤狼的诸多传说在无数世界流传。他以灰色的斗篷盖住他的盔甲，突然出现，而后又突然消失，在身后留下不义之人的尸体。无数关于这位神秘复仇者的故事被精心撰写出来，数百名自称“幼狼”的年轻英雄自发追随他的脚步，但乌尔法并没有回应他们。他既没有记住那些人的名字，也没有为他们的死亡而哀悼。他唯一渴望的只有光荣的死亡，但他的渴望迟迟未能实现。他活了下来，一如既往。

languages.text: Nachdem er seine Brüder begraben hatte, spürte Ulfar auf seinen Schultern die Last von Erschöpfung und Verlust. Seine Loyalität dem Allvater gegenüber war stark, doch sein Herz hatte in den Jahrzehnten des Kampfs viel ertragen müssen. Unfähig, seinen Schwur zu brechen, sang er alleine weiter die Saga seines Rudels. Der Letzte der Baleful Howl. Auf unzähligen Welten erzählt man sich hunderte von Legenden vom Einsamen Wolf. Er erscheint in seiner Rüstung mit einem grauen Umhang und verschwindet bald wieder. Nur die Leichen der Unrechtschaffenen bleiben zurück. Man erzählte sich Geschichten über den mysteriösen Rächer, und hunderte junger Helden begannen ihm zu folgen, die Wölflinge. Ulfar nahm nie Kontakt zu ihnen auf. Er merkte sich ihre Namen nicht und trauerte nicht um sie. Er sehnte sich nur nach einem ehrenvollen Tod, doch er konnte ihn nicht finden. Er überlebte immer.
languages.original_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar felt the weight of exhaustion and loss on his shoulders. His loyalty to the Allfather was strong, but his heart had suffered much over his decades of battles. Unable to break his vows, he continued to sing the saga of his pack alone, the last of the Baleful Howl. Hundreds of legends on myriad worlds are told of the Lone Wolf. Covering his armour with a grey cloak, he would appear and vanish again, leaving only the corpses of the unrighteous behind. Stories were crafted about the mysterious avenger, and hundreds of young heroes, Wolflings, began to follow him. Ulfar did not call on them. He did not remember their names and did not mourn them. He longed only for an honourable death, but could not find it. He always survived.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem er seine Brüder begraben hatte, spürte Ulfar auf seinen Schultern die Last von Erschöpfung und Verlust. Seine Loyalität dem Allvater gegenüber war stark, doch sein Herz hatte in den Jahrzehnten des Kampfs viel ertragen müssen. Unfähig, seinen Schwur zu brechen, sang er alleine weiter die Saga seines Rudels. Der Letzte der Baleful Howl. Hunderte von Legenden auf unzähligen Welten ranken sich um den Einsamen Wolf. Er erscheint in seiner Rüstung mit einem grauen Umhang und verschwindet bald wieder. Nur die Leichen der Unrechtschaffenen bleiben zurück. Man erzählte sich Geschichten über den mysteriösen Rächer, und Hunderte junger Helden suchten nach ihm, die Wölflinge. Ulfar nahm nie Kontakt zu ihnen auf. Er merkte sich ihre Namen nicht und trauerte nicht um sie. Er sehnte sich nur nach einem, nach einem ehrenvollen Tod, doch er konnte ihn nicht finden. Er überlebte immer.

languages.text: Après avoir enterré ses frères, Ulfar sentit peser sur ses épaules les fardeaux de l'épuisement et de la perte. S'il témoignait encore d'une loyauté sans faille à l'égard du Père de Tous, son cœur était meurtri par des décennies de combats. Incapable de renoncer à ses vœux, le dernier membre des Hurleurs sanguinaires continua à chanter seul la saga de sa meute. Le Loup solitaire fit l'objet de centaines de légendes sur une myriade de mondes. On raconte qu'il apparaissait vêtu de son armure recouverte d'une cape grise et se volatilisait peu après, en ne laissant dans son sillage que des cadavres de pécheurs. Bien des histoires furent écrites au sujet de ce mystérieux vengeur et des centaines de jeunes héros, surnommés Louveteaux, se mirent à le suivre. Cependant, Ulfar ne fit jamais appel à eux. Il ne garda pas leurs noms en mémoire ni ne les pleura. Il n'aspirait qu'à une mort honorable qui lui échappait, le condamnant à survivre encore et toujours.
languages.original_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar felt the weight of exhaustion and loss on his shoulders. His loyalty to the Allfather was strong, but his heart had suffered much over his decades of battles. Unable to break his vows, he continued to sing the saga of his pack alone, the last of the Baleful Howl. Hundreds of legends on myriad worlds are told of the Lone Wolf. Covering his armour with a grey cloak, he would appear and vanish again, leaving only the corpses of the unrighteous behind. Stories were crafted about the mysterious avenger, and hundreds of young heroes, Wolflings, began to follow him. Ulfar did not call on them. He did not remember their names and did not mourn them. He longed only for an honourable death, but could not find it. He always survived.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir enterré ses frères, Ulfar sentit peser sur ses épaules les fardeaux de l'épuisement et de la perte. S'il témoignait encore une loyauté sans faille à l'égard du Père de Tous, son cœur était meurtri par des décennies de combats. Incapable de renoncer à ses vœux, le dernier membre des Hurleurs sanguinaires continua à chanter seul la saga de sa meute. Le Loup solitaire donna naissance à des centaines de légendes sur une myriade de mondes. On raconte qu'il apparaissait vêtu de son armure recouverte d'une cape grise et se volatilisait peu de temps après, en ne laissant dans son sillage que des cadavres de pécheurs. Bien des histoires furent écrites au sujet de ce mystérieux vengeur et des centaines de jeunes héros, de Louveteaux, se mirent à sa recherche. Cependant, Ulfar ne fit jamais appel à eux. Il ne garda pas leurs noms en mémoire ni ne les pleura. Il n'aspirait qu'à une mort honorable qui lui échappait, le condamnant à survivre encore et toujours.

languages.text: Después de enterrar a sus hermanos, Ulfar sintió la carga del agotamiento y la pena sobre sus hombros. Su lealtad al Padre de todas las cosas era firme, pero su corazón había sufrido mucho en sus décadas de batalla. Incapaz de romper sus juramentos, continuó cantando la saga de su jauría en solitario, como el último del Aullido Torvo. Se cuentan un centenar de leyendas sobre el Lobo Solitario. Cubriendo su armadura con una capa gris, aparecía solo para volver a desaparecer, dejando atrás únicamente los cadáveres de los impíos. Nacieron historias en torno al misterioso justiciero, y cientos de jóvenes héroes, lobatos, fueron tras él. Ulfar nunca acudió a ellos. No recordaba sus nombres y no lloraba por ellos. Tan solo buscaba una muerte honorable, pero nunca podía conseguirla. Siempre sobrevivía.
languages.original_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar felt the weight of exhaustion and loss on his shoulders. His loyalty to the Allfather was strong, but his heart had suffered much over his decades of battles. Unable to break his vows, he continued to sing the saga of his pack alone, the last of the Baleful Howl. Hundreds of legends on myriad worlds are told of the Lone Wolf. Covering his armour with a grey cloak, he would appear and vanish again, leaving only the corpses of the unrighteous behind. Stories were crafted about the mysterious avenger, and hundreds of young heroes, Wolflings, began to follow him. Ulfar did not call on them. He did not remember their names and did not mourn them. He longed only for an honourable death, but could not find it. He always survived.

traits.locale_text: Después de enterrar a sus hermanos, Ulfar sintió la carga del agotamiento y la pena sobre sus hombros. Su lealtad al Padre de todas las cosas era firme, pero su corazón había sufrido mucho en sus décadas de batalla. Incapaz de romper sus juramentos, continuó cantando la saga de su jauría en solitario, como el último del Aullido Torvo. Cubriendo su armadura con una capa gris, aparecía solo para volver a desaparecer, dejando atrás únicamente los cadáveres de los impíos. Nacieron historias en torno al misterioso justiciero, y cientos de jóvenes héroes, lobatos, fueron tras él. Ulfar nunca acudió a ellos. No recordaba sus nombres y no lloraba por ellos. Tan solo buscaba una muerte honorable, pero nunca podía conseguirla. Siempre sobrevivía.

languages.text: 同胞の埋葬を済ませた後、ウルファーは消耗と喪失の重みを両肩に感じた。全知の父への忠誠は強かったが、その心は数十年にわたる戦いの中で多くの苦しみを抱えていた。誓いを破ることもかなわず、孤独になりながらも、彼は破滅の咆哮の最後の一人として群れの物語を歌い続けた。無数の惑星にて、何百もの一匹狼にまつわる伝承が残されている。鎧を覆う灰色のマントを身に着けたウルファーは、その姿を現してはくらませてゆく。後に残されるのは、不義なる者たちの骸だけ。この謎めいた復讐者にはさまざまな逸話が生まれ、数多のウルフリングと呼ばれる若き英雄が彼に従うようになった。しかし、それはウルファーが呼びかけたものではない。ウルファーは彼らの名を覚えておらず、彼らを悼むこともない。ウルファーはただ名誉の死だけを望んでいたが、それが叶うことはなかった。どんなときも、彼は生き残ったのだ。
languages.original_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar felt the weight of exhaustion and loss on his shoulders. His loyalty to the Allfather was strong, but his heart had suffered much over his decades of battles. Unable to break his vows, he continued to sing the saga of his pack alone, the last of the Baleful Howl. Hundreds of legends on myriad worlds are told of the Lone Wolf. Covering his armour with a grey cloak, he would appear and vanish again, leaving only the corpses of the unrighteous behind. Stories were crafted about the mysterious avenger, and hundreds of young heroes, Wolflings, began to follow him. Ulfar did not call on them. He did not remember their names and did not mourn them. He longed only for an honourable death, but could not find it. He always survived.

traits.locale_text: 同胞の埋葬を済ませた後、ウルファーは消耗と喪失の重みを両肩に感じた。全知の父への忠誠は強かったが、その心は数十年にわたる戦いの中で多くの苦しみを抱えていた。誓いを破ることもかなわず、孤独になりながらも、彼は破滅の咆哮の最後の一人として群れの物語を歌い続けた。無数の惑星にて、何百もの一匹狼にまつわる伝承が残されている。鎧を覆う灰色のマントを身に着けたウルファーは、その姿を現してはくらませてゆく。後に残されるのは、不義なる者たちの骸だけ。この謎めいた復讐者にはさまざまな逸話が生まれ、数多のウルフリングと呼ばれる若き英雄が彼に従うようになった。しかし、それはウルファーが呼びかけたものではない。ウルファーは彼らの名を覚えておらず、彼らを悼むこともない。ウルファーはただ名誉の死だけを望んでいたが、それが叶うことはなかった。どんなときも、彼は生き残ったのだ。

languages.text: Ulfar, kardeşlerini toprağa verdikten sonra bitkinliğinin ve kayıplarının yükünü omuzlarında hissetmeye başladı. Yücebaba'ya olan sadakati güçlü olsa da yüreği, on yıllardır muharebelerde çok ızdırap çekmişti. Yeminlerini bozamadığı için sürüsünün destanını, Uğursuz Uluma'dan kalan son kişi olarak kendi başına dile getirmeyi sürdürdü. Sayısız dünyada Yalnız Kurt'la ilgili yüzlerce efsane anlatıldı. Zırhını gri bir pelerinle örtüyor, ortaya çıkıyor ve ardından aniden yeniden kayboluyor, arkasında yalnızca yoldan çıkmışların cesetlerini bırakıyordu. Gizemli savaşçı hakkında hikâyeler yazıldı, kendilerine Kurt Yavruları diyen genç kahramanlar onun izinden gitti. Ulfar hiçbir zaman onlarla konuşmadı. İsimlerini hatırlamadı veya yaslarını tutmadı. Tek istediği, onurlu bir ölüme kavuşmakken aradığını bulamadı. Her seferinde hayatta kaldı.
languages.original_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar felt the weight of exhaustion and loss on his shoulders. His loyalty to the Allfather was strong, but his heart had suffered much over his decades of battles. Unable to break his vows, he continued to sing the saga of his pack alone, the last of the Baleful Howl. Hundreds of legends on myriad worlds are told of the Lone Wolf. Covering his armour with a grey cloak, he would appear and vanish again, leaving only the corpses of the unrighteous behind. Stories were crafted about the mysterious avenger, and hundreds of young heroes, Wolflings, began to follow him. Ulfar did not call on them. He did not remember their names and did not mourn them. He longed only for an honourable death, but could not find it. He always survived.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar, kardeşlerini toprağa verdikten sonra bitkinliğinin ve kayıplarının yükünü omuzlarında hissetmeye başladı. Yücebaba'ya olan sadakati güçlüydü ancak yüreği on yıllardır muharebelerde çok ızdırap çekmişti. Yeminlerini bozamadığı için sürüsünün destanını, Uğursuz Uluma'dan geriye son kalan kişi olarak, kendi başına dile getirmeyi sürdürdü. Sayısız dünyada Yalnız Kurt'a dair yüzlerce efsane anlatıldı. Zırhını gri bir pelerinle örtüyor, ortaya çıkıyor ve ardından aniden yeniden kayboluyor, arkasında yalnızca yoldan çıkmışların cesetlerini bırakıyordu. Gizemli savaşçı hakkında hikâyeler yazılmış ve kendilerine Kurt Yavruları diyen genç kahramanlar onu takip etmeye başlamıştı. Ulfar hiçbir zaman onlarla konuşmadı. İsimlerini hatırlamadı veya arkalarından yas tutmadı. Tek istediği onurlu bir ölüme kavuşmaktı ancak aradığını bulamadı. Her seferinde hayatta kaldı.
